document.full_text: eman al-obeidy, a libyan woman who burst into a tripoli hotel packed with foreign journalists in march to say that she had been raped by government forces, described her ordeal in an interview broadcast on monday.
document.title: the lede: libyan woman describes rape by qaddafi forces
lines_and_colors: eman al-obeidy, a libyan woman who burst into a tripoli hotel packed with foreign journalists in march to say that she had been raped by government forces, described her ordeal in an interview broadcast on monday.
